pullRequests.title: [Workspace Elements] Split Data Link Service
pullRequests.body:
This pull request involves significant refactoring to separate `DataLinkTableInstancesService` and `DataLinkTablesService` from the existing `DataLinksService` in the `engine/api/src/data-links` module. 

The changes primarily focus on improving code organization and maintainability by introducing dedicated services for handling data link table instances and data link tables Workspace Elements.

pullRequests.title: Pylon in-app chat is doesn't work on prod
[Limits] Limit Workspace Elements (total number and rate limit per second and per hour)
pullRequests.body:
This pull request includes several changes to improve the functionality and consistency of the `WorkspaceElementsServiceBase` class and its subclasses, along with updates to rate limit checks across various services.

### Improvements to `WorkspaceElementsServiceBase` and Subclasses:
* Updated constructors in multiple services (`action-instances.service.ts`, `actions.service.ts`, `connections.service.ts`, `data-source-instances.service.ts`, `field-mapping-instances.service.ts`, `flow-instances.service.ts`, `flows.service.ts`, `integrations.service.ts`) to include the `elements` repository parameter. [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-e0568d86a7f8be687bcad60bff897d3696d21c4376438f044bbb199abccf42adL68-R72) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-115a7ea8784854563812097150e3d0dd28236ec48138db8800c970bf35b65eb5L74-R74) [[3]](diffhunk://#diff-03debca8a0db48dcd2f60354ba9eca62156459708dc3eb493d5d09286a002f23L104-R108) [[4]](diffhunk://#diff-608c4ddd2fc4b2f780760760a56e8122d141fcce9370124a5b45ff8a3410835dL79-R83) [[5]](diffhunk://#diff-17184773942c75e06c875d04cddb3bd3e2954a2f1c970e01b36fb34989978fedL76-R80) [[6]](diffhunk://#diff-dd3277fdc432501e902a1aa50b96f859be101cb15ea007f9501c2682356c3989L98-R102) [[7]](diffhunk://#diff-b2f907e7b949da73f29b4582ccff98f70636cce51b3cdfb7e92ba54e6820cc4aL91-R91) [[8]](diffhunk://#diff-e9a127ab8b1121d26d3c066ed2ea883c294f459cf65009d4e7c07c9108d3e309L102-R106)

* Modified `WorkspaceElementsServiceBase` to extend `ElementDoc` with `Document` and added a new method `checkWorkspaceElementLimits` for checking rate limits and total elements. [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-0fc59848d9319ea2a741f4e74a45b829c7489c9ba5d5945ebfcf1fd7eb4fd3b9L24-R31) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-0fc59848d9319ea2a741f4e74a45b829c7489c9ba5d5945ebfcf1fd7eb4fd3b9L178-R203)

### Updates to Rate Limit Checks:
* Refactored rate limit checks in various services (`files.service.ts`, `incoming-webhooks.controller.ts`, `api-requests.interceptor.ts`) to use a new `CheckRateLimitOptions` interface and updated method signature for `checkRateLimit`. [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-36b26a3e833ef5bae1d968e7925da5c26fe5c3f3afcc59db793a07cf20b4d45fL65-R70) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-36b26a3e833ef5bae1d968e7925da5c26fe5c3f3afcc59db793a07cf20b4d45fL113-R118) [[3]](diffhunk://#diff-ec380ee92ae9c9c4f4717ae83586f7d181fba9edb7cfef1f94355f636f75ab0fL101-R110) [[4]](diffhunk://#diff-ec380ee92ae9c9c4f4717ae83586f7d181fba9edb7cfef1f94355f636f75ab0fL147-R156) [[5]](diffhunk://#diff-ec380ee92ae9c9c4f4717ae83586f7d181fba9edb7cfef1f94355f636f75ab0fL181-R190) [[6]](diffhunk://#diff-ec380ee92ae9c9c4f4717ae83586f7d181fba9edb7cfef1f94355f636f75ab0fL353-R362) [[7]](diffhunk://#diff-dceb27b959440cb43393c33072fcc38b05a89c25d63432ebed797bc6a28f38f7L41-R51) [[8]](diffhunk://#diff-2a511adf301efbd02fc53d67ff0bd9bfc2c5dc6bb8b2ea52afbd834d8b8037ddR29-R36) [[9]](diffhunk://#diff-2a511adf301efbd02fc53d67ff0bd9bfc2c5dc6bb8b2ea52afbd834d8b8037ddL92-R106) [[10]](diffhunk://#diff-2a511adf301efbd02fc53d67ff0bd9bfc2c5dc6bb8b2ea52afbd834d8b8037ddL117-R126)

### Codebase Simplification:
* Consolidated and cleaned up imports in several files (`workspace-elements.controller.ts`, `workspace-elements.service.ts`, `data-source-instances.service.ts`, `integrations.service.ts`). [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-f1d83f1e259328a627f1a3de84f1e90e8eb414a00ddcb0af22d17692dcb37036R2-R9) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-0fc59848d9319ea2a741f4e74a45b829c7489c9ba5d5945ebfcf1fd7eb4fd3b9R11-R17) [[3]](diffhunk://#diff-608c4ddd2fc4b2f780760760a56e8122d141fcce9370124a5b45ff8a3410835dR35-R41) [[4]](diffhunk://#diff-608c4ddd2fc4b2f780760760a56e8122d141fcce9370124a5b45ff8a3410835dL47-L53) [[5]](diffhunk://#diff-e9a127ab8b1121d26d3c066ed2ea883c294f459cf65009d4e7c07c9108d3e309R64-R68) [[6]](diffhunk://#diff-e9a127ab8b1121d26d3c066ed2ea883c294f459cf65009d4e7c07c9108d3e309L72-L76)

pullRequests.title: Reorganize Workspace Usage
pullRequests.body:
This pull request includes changes to the `Limits` component in the `console/routes/Workspaces/Workspace/Settings/Limits.tsx` file to update the time interval terminology and improve the user interface for selecting time intervals.

Terminology updates:

* Changed the `TimeInterval` type to use 'today', 'yesterday', and 'lastThirtyDays' instead of 'currentDay', 'previousDay', and 'previousMonth'.
* Updated the `getDateRange` function to handle the new time interval values. [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-e3d23ad8d4920399ef89522677d331533f7b214a3d47f07c9b5c19a3f9b64dd2L42-R49) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-e3d23ad8d4920399ef89522677d331533f7b214a3d47f07c9b5c19a3f9b64dd2L60-L64) [[3]](diffhunk://#diff-e3d23ad8d4920399ef89522677d331533f7b214a3d47f07c9b5c19a3f9b64dd2L86-R94)

User interface improvements:

* Modified the `Tabs.Trigger` values to reflect the new time interval terminology.
* Added a `Tabs.Content` component to display loading and usage data within the selected tab.


![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/8ef2dc31-3e62-40b4-8291-b4411396eac2)


![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/75bd13df-90e2-4a5b-9297-95405b5524dd)

pullRequests.title: Add trial users to orgs without invitation
pullRequests.body: This PR adds a separate endpoint to our internal `console-admin` controller that will be used to add trial users to orgs w/o sending them an invitation. Our existing invitation-based flow remains as is - users are created with a `Member` role and `Invited` status.

pullRequests.title: Limit webhook requests per second / per hour per workspace
pullRequests.body:
### Main Changes:

* Added rate limit checks using `LimitsService` in `incoming-webhooks.controller.ts` to enforce webhook request limits.

### Import Organization:

* Reordered and added missing imports in `incoming-webhooks.controller.ts` to ensure all necessary services are imported and used correctly. [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-ec380ee92ae9c9c4f4717ae83586f7d181fba9edb7cfef1f94355f636f75ab0fL21-L29) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-ec380ee92ae9c9c4f4717ae83586f7d181fba9edb7cfef1f94355f636f75ab0fR30-R51)
* Updated imports in `incoming-webhooks.module.ts` to reflect new module paths and ensure all required modules are included. [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-182ba59acd9ee1a5c898e746cefdbc1958deab9628998a396c618d128535f638R12-R28) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-182ba59acd9ee1a5c898e746cefdbc1958deab9628998a396c618d128535f638L50-L60)

### Method Call Modifications:

* Changed `await` to synchronous calls for `setAuthContext` method to improve performance in `incoming-webhooks.controller.ts`. [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-ec380ee92ae9c9c4f4717ae83586f7d181fba9edb7cfef1f94355f636f75ab0fL89-R91) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-ec380ee92ae9c9c4f4717ae83586f7d181fba9edb7cfef1f94355f636f75ab0fL122-R122) [[3]](diffhunk://#diff-ec380ee92ae9c9c4f4717ae83586f7d181fba9edb7cfef1f94355f636f75ab0fL300-R319)

### Type Usage:

* Added explicit type annotation for `allLaunchedFlowRunIds` to ensure it is an array of strings in `incoming-webhooks.controller.ts`.

pullRequests.title: Make scroll in popups more obvious
pullRequests.body:
Adding shadows to Popup content is tricky because we have many edge cases:
- Regular HTML elements like inputs and textareas
- Elements with different backgrounds
- Elements that stack on top of each other

I've tried several approaches:
- Using pseudo-elements
- Multiple backgrounds
- Various CSS combinations

All these solutions had drawbacks. We could create a more complex solution using scroll offset, but it would take more time.

For now, I only replaced the sticky footer with a regular one (and spent a few hours experimenting)  

![CleanShot 2025-01-10 at 18 28 47](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/b578c638-3763-4d01-850e-4f49caa98ede)

pullRequests.title: PL-7223 Improve panda css preflight scoping
pullRequests.body:
The issue was not visible with Vite projects and they were less strict, but failed on Next.js projects
It didn't like `::before[class^="iap"]` syntax but worked `::before:is([class^="iap"])`. First was actually wrong but passed the CSS validator.

I copy pasted this into fresh Next.js project and it works fine, not crashing

pullRequests.title: [Usage][PL-7202] Add custom code runtime to the usage stats
pullRequests.body:
This pull request enhances the usage tracking functionality by introducing a new usage type for custom code runtime duration. It also includes some refactoring to improve code readability and maintainability. The most important changes are summarized below:

### Enhancements to Usage Tracking:

* Added `UsageType.CUSTOM_CODE_RUNTIME_DURATION` to the `UsageType` enum in `sdk/src/usage/types.ts`.
* Updated `INFRA_CREDITS_BY_USAGE_TYPE` in `engine/api/src/usage/usage.service.ts` to include credits for `CUSTOM_CODE_RUNTIME_DURATION`.
* Integrated usage tracking for custom code runtime duration in `CustomCodeService` in `engine/api/src/custom-code/custom-code.service.ts`.

### Refactoring:

* Added `UsageService` and `getYYYYMMDD` utility function imports in `engine/api/src/custom-code/custom-code.service.ts` and `engine/api/src/files/files.service.ts`. [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-db4f52a589acee5b8630cc719b876c2ca45151c60ed1e09d5c89e01d085db15fL25-R27) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-36b26a3e833ef5bae1d968e7925da5c26fe5c3f3afcc59db793a07cf20b4d45fR9)
* Replaced direct date manipulation with `getYYYYMMDD` utility function in `FilesService` for consistency. [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-36b26a3e833ef5bae1d968e7925da5c26fe5c3f3afcc59db793a07cf20b4d45fL58-R59) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-36b26a3e833ef5bae1d968e7925da5c26fe5c3f3afcc59db793a07cf20b4d45fL99-R100)
